about_the_game:
Insurgence- Bloodmoon is set three years after Insurgence- Second Assault. Insurgence- Bloodmoon tells the story of Richa, Alyssa, Diana, Rissa, and Lang on a mission to investigate the region of Valdera due to an influx of refugees from Valdera to Elyria, driven by a sudden outbreak of hostile monsters that wreaked havoc there.

In the middle of their journey, our heroes were shipwrecked by a sudden storm. Richa awoke in an unknown beach all by herself. Not knowing where her friends are, can she find them? What actually happened? Unravel all the mysteries in Insurgence - Bloodmoon!

Reunite with Familiar faces!

A new adventure with Diana, Lang, and Rissa from Insurgence- Chains of Renegade and Richa and Alyssa from Insurgence - Second Assault.

Meet the new characters

Meet Eliana and Azurla the sorcerer, Max and Sharl the warrior and many other new faces!

Classic Turn Based Battle System

Create the most effective strategy for fighting enemies and use the ideal skills to defeat them!

Skill Equip system

Insurgence series’ mainstay feature returns in this title. Skill Equip allows you to choose the most suitable skills for your characters to obtain maximum results for the playstyle of each individual player.

Gorgeous hand-painted art from Award Winning Illustrator

Feel a captivating sensation from all-new, beautiful art from Einira Yuuei, Indonesia’s award-winning illustrator.

Featuring Music from Ken Nakagawa

Featuring music from renowned composer Ken Nakagawa of Atelier series and Mana Khemia fame!

Extra Notes 1

Playing previous entries in the Insurgence series is not mandatory to understand the story of Insurgence- Bloodmoon, but it is highly recommended to do so if you want to be more familiar with the world and characters of the Insurgence series.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.14 Mojave (x86) MacOS 11.2 Big Sur (Apple Silicon)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5350U (x86) / Apple M1 (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 (x86) / Apple G13G GPU 7 Cores (Apple Silicon)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
  • Additional Notes: On Apple Silicon Running on Rosetta 2, Games run on 1920X1080 at 40+ fps at High Setting (Special Effect On)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 12.4 Monterey
  • Processor: Core i5-7360U (x86) / Apple M1 (Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus 640 (x86) / Apple G13G GPU 8 Cores (Apple Silicon)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 24 Bit 192 Khz
  • Additional Notes: On Apple Silicon Running on Rosetta 2, Games run on 1920X1080 at 60+ fps at High Setting (Special Effect On)
